question.title: What is the term for the warts caused by the human papillomavirus (HPV)?
question.description: A question about the medical condition

option_a.title: Condyloma
option_a.description: A type of genital wart caused by HPV

option_b.title: Genital warts
option_b.description: A general term for warts that occur on the genitals

option_c.title: HPV lesions
option_c.description: A term that is sometimes used to describe the lesions caused by HPV

option_d.title: Condyloma acuminata
option_d.description: A specific type of genital wart caused by HPV, but not the general term for all HPV-related warts

correct_option.title: A
correct_option.description: The first letter of the correct option
